name: flavanone,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (3'-hydroxylating)
definition: Flavanone + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 3'-Hydroxyflavanone + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: the first step of two-step reaction (see R10069, R07369+R07370)
